sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../styles/PlayerProfile.css'; const PlayerProfile = ({ player }) => { return (

{player.name}

{player.position} | {player.age} años | {player.height} / {player.weight} | {player.hand}

📍 {player.location}

📧 {player.email}

Nivel: {player.level}

Entrenador: {player.coach}

📊 Estadísticas

{player.stats.points}
Puntos
{player.stats.assists}
Asistencias
{player.stats.rebounds}
Rebotes
{player.stats.steals}
Robos
{player.stats.blocks}
Tapones

📝 Biografía

{player.bio}

🎥 Videos Destacados

    {player.videos.map((video, idx) => (
  • {video.title}
    • ))}
); }; export default PlayerProfile;
